episodes.title: Royals BANISHED Andrew to get ahead of Epstein Files - but there’s lots more to come out
episodes.description:
We examine Prince Andrew’s ongoing Epstein scandal, described as a new “nightmare before Christmas,” as damaging revelations continue to surface and place renewed pressure on King Charles and Prince William. We also break down Prince Harry and Meghan Markle’s Archewell Philanthropies rebrand, exploring what the Sussex strategy signals for their public image, finances, and long-term relationship with the monarchy.

Plus, we look at a rare feel-good royal moment as Prince George follows in the footsteps of Princess Diana and Prince William, volunteering at a homeless shelter during the Christmas period. From royal scandals to symbolic acts of service, this episode unpacks what it all means for the future of the British Royal Family in 2025.

Chapters:
00:00 Prince Andrew Epstein Scandal Returns: Royal Crisis Before Christmas
01:28 King Charles and Prince William Push Andrew Aside
02:41 Sandringham Controversy: Epstein Claims and Royal Estates
05:53 Prince William Body Language Signals Final Split
08:12 Sarah Ferguson and Epstein Money Fallout
09:44 Beatrice and Eugenie in a Slimmed-Down Monarchy
12:44 Prince Andrew Loses Firearms Licence
15:10 Harry and Meghan’s Archewell Rebrand Struggles
23:25 Prince George and Princess Diana Legacy Link
29:00 King Charles Christmas Message and Royal Traditions

Royal Exclusive is your place for all the latest Royal News. Join our team of Royal experts as they give you daily insights into the British Royal family and the latest drama with Prince Harry and Meghan Markle.

episodes.title: Andrew has suffered the ULTIMATE humiliation but public may STILL bay for blood say royal experts
episodes.description:

01:15 - Should Andrew still be 8th in line or succession?
